attributes.action: Prohibit the Prime Minister from assembling a resignation Honours List
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has shown himself to be unworthy of such great office. A resignation Honours list is a convention not an entitlement and to grant such a privelige to the PM would be a further insult to the public
attributes.background: To prevent the Prime Minister from publishing a resignation Honours List

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions relating to honours or appointments. This includes petitions relating to decisions on who to nominate for an honour.

You could have a petition calling for the Government to have no role in the honours system, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
